AFC Richmond was founded in 1897,
and since then, the team have been a picture of mediocrity.
They've been up. They've been down. Mostly down.
And in the club's history,
they've never come close to what they could achieve today:
a Premier League title.
Fate is not entirely in their hands.
Their adversaries in Manchester have the final say.

to applaud their team for what they've already accomplished
